Name: Under Leaves
About the game: Under Leaves is a color-filled hidden object game from the world of animals. Gorgeous hand-drawn watercolor illustrations and a soothing soundscape make for a gently exotic experience. gorgeous hand-drawn watercolor visual relaxing gameplay and audio 9 different locations over the world 29 animated animals to discover accessible to everyone, there is no text! (just numbers)
